metadata.title: CVE-2024-46722 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: fix mc_data out-of-bounds read warningClear warning that read mc_data[i-1] may out-of-bounds.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-46722` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-261-generic - 4.4.0-261.295
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-261-generic - 4.4.0-261.295
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-261-lowlatency - 4.4.0-261.295
